title: Jennifer Lopez even makes dressing gowns looks chic as she films Marry Me
text:
Jennifer Lopez rocked a dressing gown on the streets of New York (Picture: Splash)

Jennifer Lopez has proved she really can make anything look like the epitome of fashion.

The 50-year-old was spotted on the set of her new film, Marry Me, on the streets of New York this week.

She switched the whole thing up as she headed out in a fluffy white dressing gown, on top of a white shirt and matching white trousers.

The Jenny From The Block singer clutched a sparkly cup for the outing, completing the look with comfortable-looking brown slippers.

And we have absolutely never wanted to wear an outfit more.

Seriously, how does J Lo manage to make a fluffy robe look like it landed straight off the nearest catwalk?

Is there nothing she can’t pull off? (Picture: Splash)

Jen was filming for Marry Me in New York (Picture: Splash)

Jennifer will be playing Kat Valdes in the upcoming film, alongside John Bradley, Owen Wilson and Sarah Silverman.

However, not much is known about the film just yet, with a synopsis reading: ‘A pop superstar is jilted by her rock-star fiancé moments before their wedding at Madison Square Garden, so she marries a random guy from the crowd instead.’

We’re already obsessed.

Her stint as Kat comes after she received rave reviews – and more than a couple Oscar nods – for her turn as a stripper in Hustlers.

J Lo has been tipped for an Oscar (Picture: Splash)

And, speaking about the role, Jen admitted she was totally out of her comfort zone as the character.

‘I’m used to being on stage in sexy costumes, but I have three layers of tights and fishnets and a bodysuit,’ she told ES Magazine.

‘It was a brand-new feeling to come out practically naked, in front of all those men – 300 extras hooting and hollering – and dance for money.

‘There’s something liberating and empowering about it, but you’re really out there, physically, emotionally and psychologically.’
